name: Trashovania or That Time I Fell Down A Hole
name_original: Trashovania or That Time I Fell Down A Hole
description:
Trashovania or That Time I Fell Down A Hole

Hello!

This is a metroidvania made over 17 (cumulative) days for Metroidvania Month.

It features 56 rooms, 3 boss fights, and 3 upgrades!

It is also fully remixable, you can open the game engine from the main menu and spin your own version of this game! Using the level editor, sprite editor, SFX editor, or even modifying the game's code (which is a mess lol).

(The game engine was not made during the Metroidvania Month, "Trash Engine" is a general-purpose protoyping-friendly 2D game engine, that I mostly made beforehand).

Controls:

ActionKey
Alternative Key
MoveLeft/Right Arrow
A/D
JumpJZItem 1
KXItem 2
LCMenuEscapeM
